title: PICS: Serena Williams’ daughter was a flower girl for the first time – and it was adorable!
text:
PICS: Serena Williams’ daughter was a flower girl for the first time – and it was adorable!

Cape Town - Tennis champion Serena Williams and her husband Alexis Ohanian are super proud of their two-year-old daughter and they have a very adorable reason to be.



Olympia recently performed flower girl duties for the first time at a family wedding and she knocked it out of the park.

According to the Daily Mail, little Olympia made her flower girl debut at the wedding of Alexis’ sister, Hayley.

Taking to her Instagram page, Serena shared an adorable picture where Olympia can be seen dressed in a pink dress while sporting a cute ponytail hairstyle.

"She took her flower girl job very seriously!!! @hexner14 @js_poodles congrats. So happy for you both," the proud mother wrote.

While Alexis went on Twitter to gush over how happy he was to be part of his daughter’s life.

“Our little is growing up so fast. Every year a photo. Grateful I could be there for your first months with us, @olympiaohanian.On my way to DC to make sure every American has the same opportunity for #paidfamilyleave,” he wrote.

The parents were also part of the bridal party. Serena wore a pink dress which was the same shade as Olympia’s and Alexis rocked a navy blue suit.

Take a look at some pictures from the wedding below.
description: Serena Williams and her husband Alexis Ohanian are super proud of their two-year-old daughter who was a flower girl for the first time.
